location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Nicholas Hankey Smith, Resident at Bushire to Francis Warden, Secretary to the Government, Bombay

physicalDescription.extent: Condition: The item has suffered from pest damage and some of the text in f. 43 is tricky to read as a result of a large hole that has obscured some of the body of the letter. In addition, the signature of the letter is also partially obscured. However, the author of the letter can still be identified.

mods.abstract: The letter is requesting a year's supply of stationery for the Bushire Residency.
